name: Dale
text: The en-suite in my room, it didn't drain the water fully, after showering. But after a full day of exploring It was dry.

name: Jacqueline
text: exactly what I needed for a night between a late arrival at the airport and going on by train on the next morning. Great location when travelling by train! No noisy doors in the morning.

name: Bekwele
text: It was fine and people were allowed to choose the time for breakfast instead crowded period.

name: Amanda
text: Bed was very good, at the reception very nice, gently, helpful crew!

name: Marisa
text: It's location is very good. Clean and good breakfast.

name: George
text: The location is great, just a few steps from the main square. Staff was very nice and helpful. The breakfast was good.

name: Ivan
text: Great accommodation, tidy, neat, perfect for students.

name: Karen
text: Breakfast. Location. The room was small but included what was offered and it was clean.

name: Paula
text: location is really good, nice view from the room's windows

name: Aida
text: Really good location, clean, nice staff, cozy and really nice scandinavian interior. If you are looking for something a bit more stylish than the standard corporate hotels, this is a good call.

name: Andrea
text: central

name: Paula
text: The room was very small but nicely clean and it was a perfect place to spend one night. Definitely recommended

name: Karin
text: Centrally located and very clean. Decent breakfast.

name: Toni
text: good breakfast. convenient location next to malmo train station. beds are right next to big windows, what gives them lots of brightness. very friendly staff.

name: Amanda
text: Super breakfast! Sound sleep and comfort shower. In beautiful citycentre.

name: Kevin
text: The staff was really welcoming, the room was well thought and comfortable for one person. Clever use of the space and nice alternative to not having a desk in the room and you have a chomecast available for your tv. There was a nice shared space with tables and sofas where you could sit for a relaxing moment and maybe even do some work.

name: Jenny
text: Staff was incredibly friendly and helpful. Rooms were clean. Tasty coffee. Excellent location. In general no complaints.

name: Diane
text: Location was excellent

name: Sarit
text: Everything is ok, except when I try to find my room.

name: Oliwia
text: Modern rooms, comfy beds, beautiful view and fresh breakfast

name: Luna
text: Very very very very cold rooms It was freezing cold Otherwise location and staff are excellent ❤️👏🏻

name: Nexy2307
text: Bed was comfortable, the room was clean.

name: Caroline
text: Located on the opposite side of the main station is very comfortable; breakfast room and coworking spaces are lovely.

name: Julie
text: The hotel is perfect in location. Literally one of the best locations in malmo. The staff was friendly. Room was okay (but VERY small). Breakfast was basic but nice.

name: Adrian
text: Nice river and city view Just across the street from central station and the city-airport bus station Close to city center Very good breakfast

name: Franktheguide
text: The view from the room and the simple and nutritious breakfast! The location is excellent as it's so close to the Central Station and to the attractions of the old town. Also super close to the station where the buses towards airport stop wich is great especially if you have some morning flight. Last, but not least, super friendly staff kind enough to help out in every situation needed. Thumbs up from me!

name: Jane
text: Great breakfast for price. Gluten free bread available

name: Catalina
text: Great location for a trip to Malmö. Just across the Central Station (from where you can take the train to Copenhagen or airport shuttle) and also very close (walking distance) to city center, with lots of good places to eat around. Also, hotel breakfast has plenty of options to pick from, with good coffee. Friendly staff

name: Kim
text: nice staff , nice rooms nice breakfast

name: Soumitro
text: Free tea/coffee compliments while your stay, it’s very welcoming and that’s best about the stay

name: Lucia
text: Comfortable rooms, nice breakfast, friendly staff, good value for money and close to the centre.

name: Kris
text: Location: very close to railwaystation, and walking distance to major attractions. Friendly and helpful staff, good breakfast.

name: José
text: Staff were fast and really helpful, specially during breakfast. The parking was really cool with easy access from rooms, but maybe should be just open for people with car inside parking 🙃.

name: Gary
text: location to centre and station and the staff

name: Cristian
text: Location is great, next to train station and old town. The room was clean.

name: Margaux
text: the location is perfect. just in front the central station, so perfect for travelers. and the staff is nice

name: Elena
text: Breakfast

name: Mattias
text: Room was small but adequate for my needs. Very neat and up to standards. If you need lots of space to unload things you might need to check with staff first. For its price, very good.

name: Anna
text: great location good towels big wardrobe

name: Matteo
text: We loved the strategic location and the friendly and smiling staff. Breakfast was very nice and in a beautiful bright room. I had some work to do and the common area just outside the breakfast hall was perfect to sit with laptop and work.

name: Seba
text: nice place, perfect location with everything you might need in small compact rooms. super nice staff also.

name: Mascha
text: I like the concept of lean living and the atmosphere. In addition to this the breakfast was very very good, lots of different options like different breads, fruits, yoghurt variations and so one. The staff was very friendly and you could take breakfast leftovers in the evening at the reception 🥐

name: Esther
text: The location near the central station, good view, breakfast was good, good external soundproofing so the busy road outside wasn't a bother

name: Julius
text: The personal is very friendly and the breakfast was very good.

name: Jan
text: A really good location in the centre, near to the main railway station and to the main church plus other landmarks as well. The breakfast was rich. There are common /public spaces available, including a inner terrace. The bathroom was very stylish and comfortable.

name: Joneedkhan
text: Breakfast, friendly staff, location

name: Pawel
text: A very convenient location. 100 meters to the Flygbussarna stop. 200 meters to the train station. However, I was very disappointed with the staff. On my checkout I asked them to make the rain stop pouring and they refused. They even said they would not do it for an extra fee. Especially that girl at the reception was particularly vocal about the issue. What a terrible service. ;-) ;-)

name: Linnea
text: The room was great: very clean and everything you need if you're just looking for a place to sleep. The staff was helpful.

name: Sam
text: Clean room, very good and nice bathroom, wonderful location.

name: Sebastiaan
text: Hotel is very centrally located, within just a few minutes of the train station and the downtown. Rooms are small, but had everything I needed.

name: Gabriel
text: Location, close to Central Station, bus departure to Malmo airport and evening activities. Nice and efficient work on reception. Breakfast room

name: Serhiy
text: Staff, late checkin, view, room design

name: Lee
text: breakfast and location

name: Elsa
text: The location is excellent and the room was very comfortable!

name: Raad
text: The parking to small

name: Xavier
text: - Everything good enough, nothing really "bad" - Singles rooms offered, which lacks in many other hotels! - Good breakfast (but not varied as on the pictures) - Free coffee - Great location (in front of the central station)

name: Zala
text: The reception staff was very kind and helpful

name: Lara
text: The staff was super approachable, always willing to help. The food was great. The room was clean and had everything you need.

name: Jeanne
text: Frukost!

name: Laura
text: The staff was very friendly The rooms are nice to look at, only the bathroom lacks of comfort because of its really tiny size.

name: Jaap
text: Nice little room, very clean and comfortable bed. Simple but good breakfast.

name: Florencia
text: Convenient price, awesome breakfast

name: Julia
text: Women on the desk was super nice! The room was clean and the breakfast buffet was good. For a one night stay recommendable.

name: Iryna
text: A new room, great location near to central station. Comfortable bed, overall cleanliness

name: Roberts
text: Pleasant Staff really helpful even though my Swedish was poor, The Room was clean and cosy enough. Did not get to evaluate breakfast, as I had to get to airport very early, but take-away breakfast might be a good idea.

name: Nicole
text: The staff was very friendly and helpful.

name: Astrid
text: We got free bikes, the house was so crazy mazed, due to the construction you could play hide and seek. I liked that and the breakfast was included. Breakfast was fine, free tea, Chocolat and coffee during the day. The hotel is in the city center at the train station at a great point to explore the city.

name: Diana
text: All clean, near to the central station, comfortable bed and very quiet .

name: Milosz
text: Staff was really nice. Brekfast was tasty and location is awesome.

name: Mandi
text: The location is good, right in front of the central station.

name: Gomez08
text: - modern hotel - near centrum, near station - calm - nice dining room

name: Darko
text: location, breakfast

name: Samir
text: everything was clean and really nice

name: Laura
text: Small but comfortable hotelroom. Could be a little bit cleaner, but it was ok. Right opposite the train station, so location is very good. Lovely looking restaurant for a good breakfast to start your day. Privat parking in the basement, book a spot before you stay.

name: Michela
text: Perfect location close to the central station, good breakfast with different kind of food available, very comfortable room and co-working space

name: Cristy
text: The location is great, right in front of the train station. The staff was super friendly and helpful. The room was comfortable and the bed soft, I liked it it was also super clean. Breakfast was tasty and plenty.

name: Jenny
text: Good breakfast - prefer seeing food replaced rather than too much food sitting drying out/becoming waste. Also great that I could take it to my room to eat when feeling that the room was getting a bit too crowded. Loved being able to use one of your 4 bikes - though perhaps useful to provide them with lights - I hear cyclists can get a minimum 500kr fine for each light not working, and coming back from an evening event I had a bit of anxiety that I might get stopped. But I thought your locking system was great, and the tyres were pumped. Loved getting to use it - Malmö is an excellent city to reach all the great stuff by bike! Loved the location and the 24 hour staff. Internet easy to log into.

name: Nemone
text: Breakfast was excellent

name: Rose-marie
text: Since I lost my mobile during the visit in Malmö, I got a very good understanding and help to call on your business mobile to reach my family.

name: Jurrian
text: Very clean, comfortable, great location.

name: Anne-claire
text: Staff people at the front desk are kind and helpful Central location (close to the train station, restaurants, bars, office...) Not too expensive compared to the location Calm and pretty good bedding (mattress, pillow...)

name: Viktor
text: Staff, rooms and cleanliness.

name: Jan
text: Windows would be nice :D

name: Sven
text: The breakfast room was great, they are renovating and we had one of the freshest rooms. Free coffee and tea all day.

name: Mats
text: Close location to train station. Breakfast nice, with a good selection of food. Clean room. Friendly and polite night front desk person, receiving us late night.

name: Emiel
text: Big breakfast area / living room. Modern rooms, but there are 2 parts of the hotel, one is clearly newer. If u have little luggage and want a good deal, this is a good stay. Recommend not choosing smallest room.

name: Wendy
text: Good location and clean facility’s. Less then a 10 min walk from the central train station.

name: Deise
text: Location.

name: Lok
text: Excellent breakfast, room, location, reasonable price

name: Kirill
text: The staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was nice and modern, just enough for one person.

name: Rebecka
text: We got exactly what we booked: a cheap compact room for a short overnight stay. Great location across from Malmö Central station, close to shops, bars and restaurants. Staff were super helpful and we could store our bikes for free in the garage. Good breakfast buffet.

name: Andre
text: Not all ceeling lights were working. TV/Media service was not working properly, couldnt cast with the phone.

name: Fatema
text: The location, it’s exactly in the opposite of Malmö C also loved their patio area.

name: Rolf
text: Breakfast in the morning time was very good and there was paper list at reception where could write time when to take part for breakfast. Hotel is near Malmö central railway station.

name: Kostas
text: Excellent location. Extremely nice (clean and comfy) single room with nice pillows. There's everything that you could need in a room. Definitely will come back and recommend to others.

name: Stefan
text: Perfect stopover for Flixbus and train.

name: Jeannine
text: The room had a small double bed, wardrobe, flat TV and a tiny bathroom. For a few nights it’s all you need. The breakfast was good. You can chose between little croissants, bread, cheese, ham, fruits, cereals etc. There is also a lot of choice for what to drink. You can sit inside or sit outside on the terrace. The hotel is located next to the central station and you can get everywhere in the city by feet. The hotel staff was always very friendly and kind.

name: Hans
text: Location was excellent for my needs. Breakfast was OK.

name: Claire
text: Very modern, clean rooms in a great location 5 minutes from central station and the old town. Good Scandi breakfast with breads, cheese, cold-cuts, pickles, cereal, pancakes and croissants (and Nutella!)

name: Dario
text: Great location and lovely staff. My partner and I arrived past 1 AM and we did not have any problems checking in. The room was tiny yet clean and very functional. Good breakfast and co-working facilities. Definitely recommend!

name: Sara
text: Great value for money! Breakfast lovely! Across the road from the train station.

name: Yvonne
text: I stayed in the new section where the bed was very narrow It was also difficult to get the suitcase over the large trösklar I’m front of the elevetor door on each floor. This is not very easy for disabled

name: William
text: Very comfortable room with an great view for the price. The heated bathroom floor was a great touch to dry the floor after each shower. The breakfast was good value and tasty.

name: Matea
text: It was good value for money, the very well designed room had everything you need for a short stay, very clean as well. The bed was very comfortable and the location terrific. Great breakfast too.

name: Albert
text: My room 628 was brand new even it smelled the new paint. Was facing to the central station and it even had a pretty cool terrace. The isolation was perfect and the AC worked perfectly with more than 30C outside!

name: Antonia
text: Very close to the central station and the city centre. Very cosy and a nice breakfast. Friendly staff.

name: Sten
text: Location, value for money, nice breakfast area, parking space for rented car

name: Roman
text: The bed is very confortable

name: Christina
text: The old carpet in the room , and the corridors. The hotel is under renovation so I hope they will be changed.

name: Werner
text: the room although small but well equipped with the necessary for a good stay, very clean and decorated, the atmosphere is very welcoming especially during breakfast, with many options and a relaxing and cozy atmosphere very well decorated.

name: Jasmina
text: There is nothing that I dont like in Moments hotel. Everything is fine.

name: Farzad
text: Clean room, nice personals, great location

name: Doreed
text: The accommodation was beautiful..and the service was very good

name: Thoor
text: Location super... 3 minute walk from the train station

name: Shivanand
text: very clean, good breakfast, big room and well connected to train station

name: Yamen
text: The shampoo and the room was a bit colder than I expected.

name: Andrew
text: Could not be more central, especially if traveling by train or bus.

name: Chukwuma
text: The bathroom and the bed was comfortable

name: Joaquín
text: Good breakfast, the price and the location were excellent.

name: Olivia
text: Clean and comfortable. It's a compact space but great value.

name: Hallerby
text: The room was as expected. The staff was extremely positive and nice.

name: Caroline
text: Great location and friendly staff.

name: Ingemar
text: Moment is excellent value for money and very conveniently located near the train station and city center.

name: Tota
text: The staff were very helpful and friendly.

name: Mina
text: Location - cleanliness - internet

name: Mateusz
text: Location really good. Staff good.

name: Oleksandra
text: Nice hotel in the city’s centre. The room was clean and the breakfast was good.

name: Milena
text: This hotel has one of the best prices in the city. Location is superb, check in and out was very simple, we had everything we needed and the breakfast was great. The room we stayed in was very small, but we knew that during booking and chose it according to our budget.

name: Richard
text: I paid for the cheapest room so got what I expected. Everything was ok, the staff very friendly. Cold meats, cheese bread for breakfast which was nice and fresh. Would I stay there again? YES.Excelent location next to the station.

name: Gustaf
text: Well located three star establishment. Breakfast ok. Has it’s own parking garage. So, nothing special but a decent option for a stay in Malmö.

name: Jorge
text: Comfortable room. Easy and fair-priced.

name: Hoa
text: good price, comfortable bed, convenient location

name: Kinda
text: I really like the location, the view and the staff was really nice. + the lighting was amazing

name: Simona
text: Room

name: Yvonne
text: Location, the price and staff

name: Jane
text: The breakfast was good. Fresh. Lots of vegetables. Cornflakes with milk. Super good coffee from the machine, where you get a cup through placing it under and pushing. Thanks.,

name: Marian
text: Very well located only few minutes walk from the train station and also from the some very nice squares where you can eat and walk arround.

name: Nemanja
text: The people are very friendly, polite and welcoming.

name: Nora
text: Central location, very friendly staff, small room, but for a short stay and two people it was not a problem at all. Breakfast was ok.

name: Isaac
text: Very organized

name: Jonas
text: Location is awesome. At the very heart.

name: Yi-wei
text: The table in the room was a bit small.

name: Martin_blazej
text: The hotel is near the train and bus station. The room was very small and it wasn´t so comfortable for two persons

name: Monica
text: Comfortable bed, close to railway station. Good breakfast. Friendly staff though I never found ICA they tried to direct me to. Could have been me of course. Found an excellent Italian restaurant instead, much more important.

name: Leonhard
text: Coffee/tea for free! So close to the railway station and you have everything that you need.

name: Agata
text: Perfect location, opposite the main station, next to the bus stop, from where you can get to the airport and Copenhagen. Close to the old town. Simple but delicious breakfast, friendly and very helpful staff. The room was cozy and clean

name: Alina
text: It was so comfortable to enter with your bare feet into the heated floor bathroom.

name: Mathias
text: The small single room was very compact and thereby super cosy! I had a nice view towards the harbour and the hotel is located very close to the train station, the city center is nearby as well.

name: Dominik
text: The breakfast was good and the staff very friendly. I could check in shortly before midnight. When I had a problem, they instantly helped me.

name: Arberesha
text: Very nice staff and perfect location. I left very early and they were nice to prepare a sandwich for me.

name: Dávid
text: Perfect location. 100 metres from central station, 300 metres to main square.

name: Beck
text: Staff were friendly, helpful, loaned an umbrella and a phone charger head. Laid back modern accommodation 💚

name: Sigurdur
text: NO window in my room, i need air, but you get what you pay for, relly cheep 😁

name: 박아린
text: The staff are a lovely bunch of people, helpful and welcoming. We booked as a late decision to add Malmö to our Copenhagen trip, we only stayed for 25 hours so this room was perfect for our needs. It might be a little small for a long stay but suited our needs.

name: Daphne
text: I really enjoyed the my stay in the hotel, although there was no electricity everybody was helpful.

name: Maja
text: The location was great. Easy to check in and out

name: Ysgultekin
text: Window scene was beautiful in the evening. Breakfast was good. Location was very close to central station. Price was fair.

name: Andreea
text: Staff prepared us sandwiches for the ride as we left 4 am the hotel to head to the airport. Really nice at they took care of us and the sanqiches were really good

name: Doris
text: No fridge :(

name: John
text: Central location.

name: Joanna
text: Excelent location. Friendly staff.

name: A
text: Relatively basic but comfortable, clean and affordable. Staff was super nice. Great position in the city centre, very close to the central station. Breakfast was ok and you can have coffee/tea for free 24/7.

name: Ttnnww
text: The breakfast was OK, it doesn't have everything but it gives you a good start of the day. The hotel is close to the train station so I chose this hotel if I have to catch a train early in the morning.

name: Pavel
text: Secure bag storage, comfy lounge.

name: George
text: Location was perfect, right in the city centre of malmo making it very easy to navigate around the city. Staff were very friendly and helpful when needed. Place was clean and comfortable

name: Felipe
text: Super friendly staff, almost unbeatable location by Malmö Central. I really liked the compact but very practical and nicely designed room as well.

name: Russell
text: Everything apart from the coffee. The room was comfy, clean and modern. Staff were friendly. Great location. Just fix the coffee, please

name: Abobakr
text: Customer service was great, room was comfortable and spacious. Facilities are fantastic

name: Mustafa
text: Breakfast

name: Frederik
text: The location is excellent, the room was very big and a very nice service!

name: Catharina
text: the room was clean - it wasn't too loud (against prior expectations) - location was superb for catching a train next day

name: Elina
text: Clean, cozy, well located (2 min walk from central station), nice window view

name: Igor
text: Location, hospitality, comfort.

name: Balakrishna
text: Breakfast and all the staff were friendly

name: Maryna
text: Although the room was really tiny but it was clean and comfortable. It was enough for 2 people to stay for 1 night. Location is perfect. 5mins to train and bus stations. And 10 mins to the main square

name: Pav
text: Really nice hotel, small sized room but with forward thinking and smart design. Smart tv, high pressure shower, comfortable bed and breakfast included in price.

name: Charlis
text: The location

name: Andreea
text: Very good location and nice staff. We arrived one hour earlier and still managed to go strech our legs in the room

name: Arvid
text: Second time staying in the Moment Hotel Malmö while traveling to stockholm and back. The room was clean, comfortable and the location is really central, so perfect to explore the city center. The hotel staff is helpful and the friendly. The breakfast was good. We enjoyed the stay.

name: Gokul
text: Staff are super friendly.

name: Magnus
text: Great location 2 minutes from the Malmö Central Station. Good selection at the breakfast table. Modern, albeit VERY SMALL, rooms (I upgraded from 9 m2 to 11m2 !!!).

name: Vladimir
text: The location is as central as it gets, literally steps away from the main train station/bus terminal. Check-in and check-out were very nice and the staff super-friendly. We were able to securely store our stuff for a while after check-out. Rooms are very small, but cleverly arranged so they don't feel cramped.

name: Anthony
text: The staff were friendly and very helpful.

name: Elena
text: The location and the staff.

name: Bettina
text: Cutlery and glasses were dirty everyday. :(

name: David
text: Great location, staff excellent, rooms small but clean and well equipped.

name: Lennart
text: Small,practical rooms, very comfortable.

name: Chris
text: No cleaning in the room. The shower made the entire bathroom wet- would have been good to get a longer shower curtain.

name: Irina
text: Everything was nice! Very small but comfortable, we had everything we needed

name: Marta
text: Great personal!

name: Aliazawi
text: Comfy beds and easy check in and out. Very nice lighting

name: Farah
text: It’s 5min walk from the train station

name: Annelies
text: Room was small as is usual in Sweden, no such luxuries as kettles. Location was very good near the train station or coach stop. Staff was friendly and for breakfast they presented quite a variety of foods and drink. Breakfast room a bit basic. Staff on duty 24/7 and helpful.

name: Fredrik
text: Location, friendly staff

name: Jørgen
text: friendly staff, great offer, cheap, breakfast ok (nothing special)

name: Estrella
text: Very central location

name: Maria
text: Very well located in the city and connected with Copenhagen City centre and airport¡

name: Stephanie
text: The location is really convenient and can access different area in Skane easily. You can have nice walking all the time. Quiet in the Sunday morning but it's good for photography. Quite easy to find somewhere for dining.

name: Varkey
text: The location is amazing, just opposite central station and also very close to the all touristic places in Malmo with lots of option for food. Also the staff at the reception was very helpful

name: Anaclet
text: God breakfast, nice coffee

name: Theresa
text: Location was ideal. Close to station and right in centre of Malmo. Small comfy rooms. Nice & clean breakfast area. Tasty continental breakfast choice. Very friendly & helpful staff. Would definitely use this hotel again.

name: Tingan
text: Breakfast, fast WiFi ,nice staff, elevator

name: Anders
text: Rooms are quite basic, but still nice and modern rooms. Very handy location just across the station.

name: Dejan
text: The room was pretty small but cozy and enough for one night stay. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was a very nice and tasty buffet. The hotel itself is located across the Central station and near the city centre.

name: Jetliner
text: The staff at the front desk is very helpful and pleasant, I must put emphasis on their hospitality and a very warm welcome. The room was though very small but comfortable with all the necessary facilities. Bed was also very comfortable. The location is really really fantastic, proximate to the city center (3 min walking) and just opposite to the bus station (to Malmo Airport, Copenhagen etc.) which came in very handy on check-out. It is wonderful that you can chill out in the kitchen while waiting for your bus, while they offer a variety of coffee and tea types to enjoy your time there. Good thing is that the coffee machine is working all day long. Breakfast is really good, we liked it, however, it is the same every day.

name: Glen
text: Location was amazing, short walk from everything you need I.e central station, supermarkets, bars and restaurants etc. Free breakfast was good, very continental but I was happy to embrace the culture. Room was small but comfortable, I wouldn't have expected anymore for the money I paid. Staff were helpful too

name: Ludovic
text: - Location: central, just next to the Train Station - View from the room: 6th floor offered a nice view towards train station and surroundings - Breakfast: tasty, high quality and minimalist, not too much chichi just the perfect blend to start the day - Check-in / Check-out process: very quick and professional - Good noise insulation for the room

name: Zobida
text: The staff were very helpful. I like the location. The price was right.

name: Zivojin
text: Everything was fine except the payment terms !!!

name: Krizia
text: Location close to city center and train station. Small room and bathroom, but you know that in advance.

name: Corina
text: It was very cold in the room, the breakfast was poor

name: Marion
text: I found Malmo to be a cute little historic town with many activities available. The hotel location was excellent, being just across the canal from the Central station. It was easy to walk through the lanes and village squares for shops & cafes, visit the castle, museum and fabulous aquarium, the gardens & to have a little tourist train city tour. I was there for 3 days and could have spent longer. I didn't travel across The Bridge to Copenhagen, although it was easy to see from the harbour. In the hotel there was a good variety of breakfast choices and plenty of table and chairs. Reception were friendly and helpful.

name: Sarah
text: Central location. Good breakfast. Good value

name: Petarpetrovic
text: The check in and check out process is very quick and straightforward. Staff is super nice. Breakfast is great and the location of the hotel couldn't be better, it's very close to the city center with many tourist attractions. Although the location is near the city center, the neighborhood is quiet and the beds are extremely comfortable.

name: Monika
text: The location was great and the room was cozy. It was well worth the money. The breakfast was good. Nothing special, but overall good. The staff was friendly and helpful.

name: Solveig
text: Very central, 3 mins from Central Station. Friendly staff. A great perk is being able to check in early for only 95kr. They also have free bikes which is amazing (although not always available). They were able to give me gluten free bread for breakfast. Comfortable bed.

name: Julie
text: Excellent location minutes away from the railway station. Clean rooms- extremely friendly and helpful staff. Small lounge available to guests at all times with free hot drinks available.

name: Katie
text: Everything else however was spot on.

name: Abed
text: The staff are extremely friendly, helped us a lot , The location is amazing a few steps from everything

name: Ryanko0
text: Staff there are friendly, station is just at opposite side of hotel. If you parked car in the garage which hotel's belongs to, you can keep your car remaining after checked out the room and do more sightseeing in Malmö until 15:00pm.

name: Radosław
text: Room was small but practical. Very clean and thoughtfully arranged. Location just by the main railway/bus station is the biggest plus. Towels and shower gel very supplied in the bathroom, but we got only one towels set while the reservation was made for 2 people (thankfully staff was more than pleased to help, just one trip to the front desk was required).

name: Aneta
text: Good location, within walking distance to major sights and Central station. Comfy bed, very tasty breakfast that was included in the price.

name: Weifeng
text: Excellent location！Good breakfast！

name: David
text: Good quality reasonable Hotel in a excellent location in Malmo.

name: Iván
text: The location of this property is excellent and bikes are provided without any extra payment.

name: Inga
text: Staff very friendly, welcoming and very helpful. Small but comfortable room with view at train station, delicious breakfasts. 2 minutes walk from central station and coach stop

name: Masuma

The staff is really friendly, helpful, late in the evening and early in the morning as well. The breakfast is good, there is a variety of cold dishes to choose from. It was perfect for a weekend city-break. Upon arrival I realized that they only provided one duvet, and as I was traveling with my Mom I requested an extra, which they provided immediately (at 01:00 in the evening).

It was quite irritating because I specifically chose the hotel because of the included breakfast early in the morning. Moreover the TV in the room didn't work very well (the picture was distorted) and the room wasn't very clean either. The bed was OK. Still: Would not recommend.

text: I was staying during Malmö Festival and there was a stage across from the hotel. The windows were good enough to let me sleep in peace while the rock concert continued into the night.

name: Annsms
text: The hotel is nicely located: we could take a pleasant walk around the city with no difficulties. We happened to stay there during Malmö music festival and were able to visit its main scenes really easily. We could even watch the Rock stage performance just from our room window. The room was quite small, but included everything we needed for a comfortable short stay. The breakfast area was open all the time, so we could borrow tableware any moment, as well as get some hot water there.

Every morning there is a breakfast that includes granola, yoghurts, ham, cheese, fruit,... and the coffee/chocolate machine is available 24/7 in the same breakfast room.

I also appreciate that the cleaning is done only every 5 days - not only it is more environmental, it also allows you to have more privacy (if you stay two days, nobody enters your room).

name: Anonymous
text: Was happy with this hotel until another guest walked into my room at approaching midnight, when I was in there. Not only did his door key allow him to open my room (door handle should only work with room key), but it also overrode that I had locked it from the inside. Person on desk came up to investigate when I went down to report it but at that stage he had gone to his own room & as the hotel was full, they couldn't move me to another room. So I was left to spend the night in a room that could not be locked (said nothing could be done until maintenance came in in the morning). Staff member said to let her know if any further issues but not sure how she expected me to do that from 6 floors up should someone come into my room again (no phone connections to reception from room). I was still charged full rate for room I was not secure in. Would not recommend this hotel for solo travellers.

name: Лариса
text: Я сама выбрала одноместный номер без окна. Для Швеции это очень дешевый номер, учитывая, что он находился в самом центре города. Кровать очень удобная. В номере фен, зеркало, много полочек, вешалка, плечики, табуретка. На каждом этаже есть гладильные доски и уголок уединения, можно посидеть в кресле рядом с настольной лампой и почитать книжку. Всё новейшее, отель открылся летом. И еще проходит реконструкция внутренней веранды. Телевизор ловил всего 3 шведских канала. Я смотрела в основном детский канал. Там даже "Машу и Медведя" показывали. Забавно. Завтраки бюджетные. Мюсли, вареное яйцо. Нарезка овощей и фруктов. несколько сортов хлеба и джема. Несколько видов чая и кофе, а еще вкуснейший горячий шоколад. Зона приема пищи закрывалась в 22 часа. Поэтому всегда можно было выпить чай, кофе или горячий шоколад. Микроволновку заметила только в последний вечер. Брала бы в магазине еду для разогревания, а так ужинала творогом или очень вкусной шведской рыбкой. В отеле в основном на короткий срок останавливаются транзитные путешественники, которым нужно в аэропорты Копенгагена или Мальмё ранним утром или поздним вечером, так как поезда и автобусы ходят круглые сутки, а вокзал в двух минутах ходьбы, остановка автобусов через дорогу от отеля.

Wenn es Toilettenpapier für alle kostenlos gibt ist es nur fair und fortschrittlich auch für Frauen das notwendige Hygienematerial bereit zu stellen.

name: Kimmie

name: Margareta
text: Rent och snyggt, fräscha rum och framförallt tyst. Eminent frukostbuffé! Nära till allt.

name: Melanie
text: Wir waren zwei Mal im Moments Hotel Malmö. Beim ersten Mal hatten wir eins der Komplett neu renovierten Zimmer. Das war sehr schön, mit Ausblick über die Stadt, separaten Bad und insgesamt etwas mehr Platz. Beim zweiten Mal hatten wir ein anderes Zimmer, welches ebenfalls sehr schön war, aber bedeutend kleiner! Für eine Nacht war das okay, aber für länger wäre es mir zu zweit zu klein, zu mal einfach Ablageflächen fehlen. Beide Zimmer waren aber super sauber und gemütlich. Auch das Frühstück war beide Male einfach perfekt! Nicht so viel Auswahl wie bei anderen Hotels vielleicht, aber alles wichtige ist da. Brot/Brötchen, verschiedene Sorten Aufschnitt, Marmelade, Schokoaufstrich, Obst, Müsli, Saft und für vegane Optionen ist auch gesorgt. Klasse fanden wir auch, dass man sich immer Tee oder Kaffee zubereiten konnte. (nur Milch-/alternativen standen nach dem Frühstück nicht mehr bereit). Die Lage des Hotels ist unschlagbar. Der Innenhof hat uns auch sehr gut gefallen.

name: Angelika
text: Ein junges Hotel in bester Lage. Unsere Zimmer waren im neu eingerichteten Teil des Hauses, schön eingerichtet und z.T. etwas beengt. Der Frühstücksraum ist immer offen und ein Co-Working-Space. Das Frühstück ist prima. Wir genossen unseren Aufenthalt in Malmö.

name: Cecilia
text: Fint och rent Bekväm säng

name: Tanya
text: Super Lage, sehr gemütliches und modernes Zimmer (hatte ein Einzelzimmer) mit Blick über Malmö. Das Frühstück war sehr gut und ein Pluspunkt war die kleine Parkgerage unter den Hotel. Ich war sehr zufrieden und empfehle es auf jeden Fall weiter!

name: Frauke

name: Sophie

name: Rickard
text: Mycket bra

name: Marcell
text: A reggeli nagyszerű volt, van egy belső terasz is ahol nyugodtan lehet étkezni reggel. Az egyszemélyes szoba pont olyan, mint amilyennek egy egyszemélyes szobának lennie kell. A fürdőszoba kialakítása külön tetszett. A személyzet profi, nem volt semmilyen gond. A tv-re rá lehet csatlakozni telefonról is, így akár youtube-ozhat is az ember, bár én inkább a svéd műsorokat néztem.

name: Charline
text: Hotel charmant, accueil très chaleureux. Propreté des lieux et petit-dej très agréable avec une grande terrasse. Bon emplacement avec parking public a proximité. Bon souvenir lors de notre voyage.

name: Azul
text: Buena atención del personal y buena ubicación.

name: Tanja
text: Die Mitarbeiter waren sehr hilfsbereit und freundlich. Das Einzelzimmer war trotz der geringen Größe optimal genutzt und komfortabel. Super Lage, sehr gutes Frühstück in einem schönen Raum. Es gibt eine kleine Garage, was sehr praktisch war. Ich war sehr zufrieden!

name: Jendrik
text: Sehr sauber und es sind sehr neue Zimmer. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich.

name: Daniele
text: La posizione dell'hotel è ottima, la colazione è buona.

name: Niklas
text: Das Frühstück war außergewöhnlich gut!

name: Halldór
text: Läget, sängen var bekväm.

name: Stefanie
text: De locatie is echt super! Je zit midden in de binnenstad. Personeel was vriendelijk, was telefonisch bereikbaar en behulpzaam toen we autoproblemen hadden. Personeel hielp bij het opbergen van de koffers in de bagage kamer toen we na uitchecken nog de stad in gingen. Aanrader; huur 1 van de vele elektrische stepjes (Bolt, Tier, Voi etc) in de binnenstad en verken de stad per step! Super leuk! Simpel, maar prima ontbijt.

name: Leonie-isabelle
text: Super freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal. Die Fahrräder die man sich ausleihen konnte waren auch sehr gut. Die Zimmer sind allerdings sehr klein. Für einen kurzen Trip in Ordnung.

name: Freshdj
text: Nettes Personal, super Lage, gutes einfaches Buffet zum Frühstück

name: Pierre
text: L'emplacement dans Malmö est excellent, de même que le petit déjeuner, l'accueil et le personnel très arrangeant.

name: Hanna
text: Läget var kanon. Prisvärt. God frukost.

name: Mikael
text: Bra frukost, bra och prisvärt rum och utomordentligt trevlig personal.

name: Maria
text: Wir hatten ein kleines Doppelzimmer gebucht und es ist wirklich klein. Für zwei Nächte war es okay. Das 140er Bett war direkt am Fenster und der Blick ging zum Central Station, Straße und Wasser. Die Fenster sind dreifach verglast, sonst würde man die Autos sehr gut hören. Mit Ohrstöpsel und gekippten Fenster konnten wir gut schlafen ;) Die Kissen waren etwas klein und hart. Kein Kleiderschrank, wenig Ablageflächen, einige Haken ab der Wand und ein paar Kleiderbügel. Kleiner Klapptisch und ein Stuhl waren auch vorhanden. Das Badezimmer ist wirklich klein, sehr kleines Waschbecken und auch wenig Ablagefläche. Der Wasserdruck ist super, die Handbrause hängt zu tief und der kleine Regenduschkopf zu hoch. Nach dem Duschen ist das Bad etwa geflutet, trocknet aber schnell. Ein zusätzliches Handtuch oder eine Fußmatte wäre praktisch. Das Wlan funktionierte super. Das Frühstück war reichhaltig und hatte eine gute Auswahl. Kaffee, Tee, Kakao gab es aus einem Automaten (gratis) und war jederzeit verfügbar. Neben dem Hoteleingang ist auch die Einfahrt zur Tiefgarage, die mit einem Aufzug zum Hotel verbunden ist. Wir hatten außerhalb in einem Parkhaus geparkt, ca. 50€ für zwei Tage. Wir haben uns Wohlgefühl, würden es für einen Kurztrip empfehlen und wiederkommen.

name: Michel
text: Personal sehr freundlich! Frühstück war sehr gut! Zimmer zweckmäßig, ruhig und sauber! Fernseher war sehr sehr gut!

name: David
text: Kleine maar nette kamers en precies goed voor een stedentrip. Goede locatie.

text: Super Service, sehr nettes Personal, tolles Frühstück, sehr saubere mordene Zimmer!

name: Björn
text: Nytt o fräscht. Bodde i den nya delen.

name: Göran
text: Nytt rent och bra läge

name: Anika
text: Lage unschlagbar, super zentral. Zimmer klein aber völlig ausreichend. Frühstück hatte alles was man braucht. Personal extrem freundlich und hilfsbereit.

name: Melanie
text: Das Hotel ist neu renoviert, daher ist alles in einem sehr guten Zustand. Der Frühstücks Raum und das Frühstücks Buffet sowie die Terasse haben uns besonders gefallen. Das Personal an der Rezeption war immer freundlich und auch beim Frühstück waren alle zuvorkommend und sehr nett.

name: Ralf
text: Da mein Zimmer etwas zu klein war hat man flexibel reagiert und mir dann ein größeres zur Verfügung gestellt.! Personal sehr freundlich!! Danke an Maria !!

name: Madeleine
text: Jättebra frukost. Välstädat, rent. Mycket vänlig och trevlig personal. Tyst. Mycket bra läge.

name: Despina
text: Att det var ny renoverad!!

name: Elisabeth
text: Die Zimmer sind zwar klein, aber für einen Kurzaufenthalt völlig ausreichend. Frühstück sehr gut und reichhaltig. Lage sehr zentral.

name: Katarina
text: Jag tyckte om det nyrenoverade och fräscha rummet, Skön säng och kudde. Hade kunnat göras lite mer personligt med någon tavla t ex. Lugnt och skönt, utan en massa oljud från trafiken. Bra struktur vid frukosten, var påfyllt och snyggt trots att jag var där just när det var som flest gäster. Smidig utcheckning!

name: Fredrik
text: Helt okej, basic.

name: Anni
text: Gode senge, fin standart Lækkert nyt interiør

name: Malin
text: Frukosten var okej, inget spektakulärt, bra med glutenfritt och laktosfritt. Bra sängar! Små rum, fräscha dock.

name: Gladepetter
text: Läget

name: Frau
text: Super Lage, leckeres Frühstück!

name: Naja
text: Meget fint til den enkelte overnatning vi brugte der, dog var udvalget i morgenbuffeten ret småt og måtte gerne have flere kødfri muligheder. Very nice hotel for the single night we spent there, even though it would be nice with more meatless options at the breakfast.

name: Thomas
text: Alles was ich brauchte war da, die Einrichtung war gut durchdacht. Für einen Kurzaufenthalt ideal, vor allem, wenn man mit dem Zug an- und abreist. DasHotel liegt gegenüber dem Hauptbahnhof und nach wenige Minuten ist man zu Fuß im Zentrum. Das Frühstück war sehr gut, es war im Preis inbegriffen.

name: Anette
text: Tolles Hotel. Sehr gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis . Großes Frühstücksbüffet. Sehr zu empfehlen

name: Tove
text: Bra läge, mycket bra med lånecyklar! Bra frukost!

name: Lisa
text: Leckeres Frühstück, tolle Lage, hilfsbereites Personal!

name: Helen
text: Rummet passade utmärkt till mina behov vid denna resa. Jag ville ha en plats att sova på som var ok. Rent, trevlig personal.

name: Amanda
text: Hotellet har en fantastisk beliggenhed i Malmø og morgenmaden var helt fint til mig og min veninde. Alt personalet vi mødte var flinke og hjælpsomme

name: Maria
text: Bra frukost, det fanns det som behövs. Läget är kanon!

name: Ulla
text: Enkel frukost. Helt ok.

name: Steeve
text: Malmö est une ville très attractive. Il y a beaucoup de restaurants végétariens de haute qualité https://www.mineralmalmo.se . Le quartier de BO01 est toujours agréable à parcourir. Ne pas rater le https://www.konsthall.malmo.se il y a toujours de bonnes expo, ne pas manquer le café Smak et sa terrasse https://smak.info .

name: Kicki
text: Bra pris, bra litet rum - jag behövde inte mer för mitt snabba stopp.

name: Stefan
text: Bra frukost i det vackra och rymliga frukostrummet. Läget perfekt nära Malmö C och Stortorget. Sängen bred och bekväm.

name: Joakim
text: Frukosten var bra och närheten till centrum är utmärkt. om man har ett rum utan fönster blir blir man inte störd av bilar eller festande på stan.

name: Susanne
text: Rent o fräscht Bra läge Tysta rum mot gården

name: Anja
text: Frühstück, sehr bequemes Bett, sehr ruhig und trotzdem sehr zentral gelegen, gut für einen Kurztrip (ich war aber eine Woche da)

name: Emma
text: Vi fick bara en handduk för ett dubbelrum

name: Melissa
text: Super god beliggenhed lige ved siden af banegården og tæt på byen. Venligt og meget hjælpsomt personale. God solid morgenmad.

name: Sarah
text: Prisvärt och bra läge

name: Anne
text: Morgenmaden var rigtig god, og hotellets beliggenhed var perfekt. Tæt på stationen, busholdeplads og byen. Jeg havde et enkeltmandsværelse, småt men godt. Der var meget varmt, og desværre meget larm fra gaden gennem det åbne vindue. Jeg snakkede med det hjælpsomme personale og fik en vifte til afkøling af rummet😁Der var lidt knas ved indcheckning , nogle rengøringsmidler, der ikke var leveret eller lignende, men i ventetiden kunne jeg bare gå op i morgenmadsområdet, der havde et dejligt udendørs område, og drikke al den kaffe jeg ville😁

name: Dr
text: Für einen Kurzaufenthalt in Malmö erste Wahl. Zimmer klein aber zweckmäßig. Zwei Minuten bis zur Altstadt

name: Zana
text: dusjen, senga og behagelig atmosfær.

name: Ronald
text: De locatie is perfect.

name: Uta
text: Angebot vegan nicht ausreichend.

name: Nadine
text: Das Hotel ist super zentral gelegen. Das Zimmer war sehr klein aber sauber und Modern. Das Frühstück war lecker, der Frühstückssaal ist sehr schön.

name: Eva
text: Centralt läge, utsikten från 6:e våningen, bra frukost serverad av proffsig och trevlig personal. Skön säng.

name: Leonie
text: Die neuen Einzelzimmer im Dachgeschoss sind wirklich sehr gemütlich. Zudem hat man eine tolle Aussicht. Das Bad ist etwas zweckmäßig eingerichtet aber völlig ausreichend.

name: Яна
text: Хорошие завтраки. Прекрасное местоположение.

name: Evgeniya
text: Schönes modernes Hotel, hervorragende Lage, kleine, jedoch sehr ergonomische Zimmer, super freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal, leckeres Frühstück. Zumindest für alleinreisende sehr zu empfehlen👍👍👍

name: Mats
text: Det fattades bacon och äggröra,sill

name: Wilson
text: Bra läge. Litet men helt ok rum. Bra frukost. Trevlig personal.

name: Christoffer
text: Hade bokat ett mindre dubbel för två personer. Väl på plats visade det sig att det hade blivit något fel i bokningen och vi hade blivit tilldelade ett enkelrum. Efter att pratat med personalen i receptionen berättade de att de skulle försöka lösa något trotts att det var fullbokat. Efter en bit mat i magen och tillbaka på hotellet hade de löst ett dubbelrum till oss. Kanonbra!

name: Anneli
text: Kunde varit lite längre duschdraperier lr en skena typ på klinkergolvet i badrummet blev väldigt blött. Annars helt ok. Ha en skön sommar! 😎🇸🇪

name: Simone
text: Stort og rent værelse og god beliggenhed

name: Ingrid
text: Fräscht, rent, centralt, skön säng och trevlig och hjälpsam personal

name: Per
text: Bra läge. Rent och fräscht.

name: Sofie
text: Det var alldeles för varmt på hela hotellet, det fanns ingen AC

name: Berglind
text: Frukosten var bra med med enkelt utbud.

name: Petra
text: Allt var rent och fräscht. Compact living på ett bra sätt

name: Eva
text: Komfortabelt til billig pris. Mulighed for enkelt værelse og den lille plads var helt ok for mig. Og vinduet kunne åbnes!

name: Beatrice
text: Bra läge, luftiga och moderna lokaler samt trevlig personal.

name: Ida
text: Frukosten var okej, salen var stor nog och det var inte så mycket trängsel. Konceptet med hotellet är väl att det inte ska vara överflöd, därav var frukosten inget märkvärdigt och rummet var inte större än nödvändigt. Man får vad man betalar för!

name: Charlotte
text: Mycket för pengarna. Nära centrum och centralstationen. Hade varit bra om det stod bättre var det låg så att man kunde ta sikte på Bishop arms och savoy Hotel.

name: Eva
text: Trevlig personal, bra läge, prisvärt., bra frukost.

name: Helena
text: Rummet standard och helt enligt förväntan. Frukostmatsalen väldigt fin, frukost utbudet ok.

name: Emelie
text: Sängen var skön. Läget kanon.

name: Lisa
text: För att vara så billigt så var det ert utmärkt hotell. Personalen var supertrevligt och rummet litet men fräscht och modernt. Frukosten perfekt.

name: Sebastian
text: Sehr freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal, leckeres Frühstück und 1a Lage, die perfekt war als Ausgangspunkt für die Erkundung der Stadt. Immer wieder gern!

name: Mirza
text: Väl prisvärt, bra lägefrescht, dock rummen känns väldigt minimalistiska ...varmt Men med en viss dos alkohol i kroppen funkar det jättebra att sova🤣

name: Teofilo
text: Det är ett bra område där hotellet ligger och frukosten var mycket bra.

name: Anette
text: ok, läget och garegeplatsen.Personal trevlig.

name: Juliane
text: Das Personal war freundlich, das Frühstück war in Ordnung, Leihfahrräder gratis, das war toll, allerdings waren diese nicht gut in Schuss.

name: Cecilia
text: Personalens hjälpsamhet! Möjlighet att parkera cyklarna i garaget. Läget i stan, nära till Centralen och allt annat.

name: Rebecca
text: Allt

name: Vrenscha
text: Gute Ausstattung des Zimmers, so dass der Platz optimal genutzt werden konnte, vielleicht sogar besser als in anderen Hotels mit größeren Zimmern.

name: Anna
text: simpel men täckte de basala frukost-tillbehören!

name: Abonesh
text: Jag kommer att boka mina hotell besök hos er 🌺

name: Anna
text: Litet och kompakt men hade allt man vill ha. Bra frukost.

name: Lenka
text: Die Hotellage

name: Pia
text: Skön säng ! Frukostbuffen var precis lagom. Tycker inte om när det är för mycket

name: Andre
text: bra

name: Marcella
text: Das Personal war überall sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Großes Lob an das Personal!

name: Bernhard
text: Sauber gut ausgestattet

name: Evert
text: bra

name: Marita
text: Prisvärt boende nära Centralstationen. Perfekt för den som reser ensam.

name: Isidor
text: Vänlig personal

name: Volker
text: Sehr freundliches Personal trotz der schwierigen Pandemielage.

name: Caroline
text: Hotellet ligger väldigt centralt och wifi fungerade utan problem. Fräscht och väldigt prisvärt.

name: Kristina
text: Väldigt trevlig och serviceinrikad personal, för det priset bra rum som har precis det man behöver!

name: Daniel
text: Otroligt bra läge vid centralen. Rummet var litet och enkelt, men allt jag behövde. Stördes inte av bussar eller tåg trots all trafik utanför. Skönnsäng. Fräscht och funktionellt. Enkel men helt tillräcklig frukost. För de pengarna jag betalade ett bra val.

name: Dieter
text: Sinkavloppet var igensatt

name: Marina
text: Perfekt läge vid centralstation, bra frukost. Vi är nöjda med vår vistelse.

name: Charlie
text: Centralt och fräscht

name: Marita
text: Trevlig personal, rent och snyggt.

name: Kenneth
text: Frukosten var riktigt bra, lokalen ren och snygg, senare i sommar även en ute terass

name: Heidi
text: Närheten till allt. Det var fräscht. Trevlig och tillmötesgående personal.

name: Chriister
text: Trevlig personal och bra läge. Sängen var skön.

name: Elina
text: Bra läge i stan, fräscht. Bekväm säng.

name: Mimmi
text: Kanonväder. Supersköna sängar.

name: Edvin
text: Att det är nära centralt och nära till allt

name: Hassan
text: Nice

name: Stefan
text: Ok frukost

name: Elisabeth
text: Frukosten var bra men jag skulle också vilja ha löskokta ägg, inte bara hårdkokta som nu. Kaffeutbudet var jättebra.

name: Mozes
text: Toppen känsla! Kändes att man bor på hotell och utsikten var suverän. Great!

name: Melin
text: Superfin service med jättetrevlig personal. Fräscht och fint hotell.

name: Niklas
text: En "lätt" frukost men bra

name: Nilsson
text: Det såg nytt o fräscht ut.

name: Franc
text: bra

name: Fantastic
text: Vi bokade 3 rum. 1 av dem med stor säng. Sängen va skön. Men rummet va väldigt kalt och tråkigt. Utsikt mot liten innergård där man såg massa stök. Ombyggnation. De två mindre rummen med mindre säng va väldigt trånga men fina och fräscha. Utsikt ut mot stan.

name: Tim
text: Tycker rummen är väldigt mysiga, skön säng, bra läge. Duschen är väldigt nice. Jättetrevlig personal och god frukost.

name: Jimmy
text: Mysigt litet rum (compact living Tokyo style) med en fin utsikt över å och centralstationen. Mycket trevlig personal!

name: Annelie
text: Die Lage ist sehr gut, nur 150 m vom Bahnhof entfernt. Die Zimmer sind ok. Da zur Zeit Renovierungsarbeiten stattfinden, die wohl noch bis zum Herbst dauern werden, wird sich danach die Ausstattung verbessern. Das Frühstück war ausreichend. Ein Ei zum Frühstück hätte ich mir gewünscht.

name: Manuel
text: Bien situado, poco más.

name: Omar
text: Parkerings avgiften på 200kr per natt...

name: Mari
text: Det var ett bra ställe nära till allt

name: Thea
text: Gillade att det var nära stationen, trevlig personal och väldigt god frukost :)

name: Annelie
text: Die Lage ist super, direkt gegenüber vom Bahnhof.

name: Magnus
text: Skön säng och fräscht rom och hotell. Trevlig och vänlig personal.

name: Lenamarie
text: Frukosten kunde vara lite roligare även om det är covid nu.En bättre fralla , ett ägg och juice från köket som kaffet hade varit trevligare.

name: Anna
text: Mycket fin service med en frukostpåse att ta med på tåget hem.

name: Anne-li
text: Frukosten var en stor besvikelse. Ingen havremjölk så jag kunde inte dricka kaffe.

name: Jeanette
text: Åt tyvärr inte frukosten

name: Jenny
text: Mysigt litet rum lagom för 2 en natt.Gott med värmegolv i badrummet.

name: Mats
text: Lite enkel frukost.

name: Märta
text: Fin inredning i gemensamma utrymmen, skön säng.

name: Maryorie
text: frukost var god

name: Bengt
text: Fantastisk matsal.

name: Helena
text: Frukosten och den fina matsalen. Personalens bemötande var fint. Närheten till stationen, bussarna och promenadstråken.

name: Lazar
text: Locatia este excelenta, aproape de mijloacele de transport!

name: Niclas
text: Nära, bekvämt och prisvärt! Supertrevlig personal! Enkel men Bra frukost. Litet men trevligt rum.

name: Alicia
text: Das Frühstück war sehr lecker und der Frühstücksraum sehr gemütlich. Tee und Kaffee waren den ganzen Tag lang erhältlich. Die Auswahl war zwar nicht übermäßig groß, aber absolut ausreichend und auch für Vegetarier gut geeignet.

name: Anne-christine
text: Städerskorna var väldigt gulliga och hjälpsamma. Också de som jobbar i matsalen. Jag fick fint mottagande och fin information när jag kom till hotellet.

name: Jakob
text: Det ligger centralt och det är prisvärt.

name: Tomas
text: Trångt och lite dyrt att parkera.

name: Anna
text: Sköna sängar! Centralt och prisvärt. Trevlig personal. Man fick och hade det som behövdes och inget mer. Passar mig perfekt.

name: Petra
text: Sehr zentrale Lage direkt am Bahnhof. Das Frühstück hatte eine gute Auswahl an Speisen. Das Zimmer war für einen Städte-Trip von der größe Ausreichend.

name: Lena
text: Centralt, prisvärt, bra frukost, trevlig personal.

name: Michaelle
text: Stor Eloge till den Suveränt trevliga personalen i receptionen! Super hjälpsamma, hejdade glatt på en och såg till att man hade det bra. Unga killar, så blev extra överraskad över deras gentleman service 😀👍

name: Ena
text: Bra läge, ren och personalen var bra.

name: Chari
text: La amabilidad del personal. Es la segunda vez que me alojaba, y espero que no sea la última...

name: Hans-l
text: Det var ju otroligt små rum!!!

name: Linn
text: Tyckte det var trevlig personal. Väldigt mysigt hotell.

name: Per
text: Bra stor säng 140x200

name: Bergkvist
text: Glad, trevlig och serviceminded personal. Läget är toppen, tillgång till parkering ett jätteplus. Att kunna låna cyklar, var jättebra, dock var det nog dags att uppdatera dem😁

name: Louise
text: Bra läge men frukosten var lite trist d v s automatkaffet smakade mindre bra.

name: Robert
text: Direkt am Bahnhof gelegen, auch Innenstadt alles fußläufig erreichbar.

name: Carolina
text: Habitacion muy cómoda y limpia.

name: Ingo
text: Das Frühstücksbuffet war sehr überschaubar und nicht sehr ausgefallen. Da hätten wir uns gerne mehr gewünscht. Beim Duschen im Badezimmer wird nahezu das ganze Bad geflutet, da keine genaue Abgrenzung vorhanden ist.

name: Petra
text: Nytt fräscht hotell. Små fin rum med bekväma sängar och inredning som uppfyller dina behov. Personalen har alltid ett stort leende och väldigt trevliga och tillmötesgående. Rekomenderar verkligen detta hotell om du ska till Malmö otroligt centralt läge

name: Georg
text: Sehr freundlicher, hilfsbereiter Empfang an der Rezeption - kostenfreier Stellplatz für meinen Motorroller in der sicheren Tiefgarage - sehr ruhiges, wenn auch kleines, dafür total gemütliches Zimmer auf Etage sechs - hochwertiges Bett mit entsprechend modernster Bettwäsche - Super Dusche - abwechslungsreiches Frühstück - sehr einfaches Ein- und auschecken - schnelles W-LAN/Internet!

name: Emma
text: Bra frukost. Skönt att det låg nära stationen och stan. Mycket trevlig personal.

name: Alexandru
text: Micul dejun ff bun

name: Carin
text: Frukosten var en liten besvikelse men med tanke på priset så var det ändå ok.

name: Per
text: Centralt placering

name: Natalie
text: Lite oengagerad frukost

name: Mikael
text: Prisvärt hotell.

name: Elisabet
text: Hade hört om htl men att det va enkelt o frukosten skulle inte vara nått särskilt. Förväntade mig inte så mycket så jag blev överaskat förvånad. Litet men bekvämt. Allt fanns. Skön säng. Frukostbudet var helt ok o gott. Super bra läge. Kommer absolut använda mig o rekommendera er i framtiden. Mvh Lisa

name: Daniel
text: -Läget -Hjälpsam personal -skohorn på rummet -prisvärt -välstädat -fina badrum -överlag fräscha rum

name: Nader
text: Ingen parkeringsplats fanns hos hotellet. Frukosten kan vara mer varierad, alltså innehåller mer sort mat.

name: Inger
text: Perfekt läge, nära till allt.

name: Lena
text: Sehr zentral, zwischen Hafen und Zentrum. Schöne moderne Zimmer. Gutes Frühstück.

name: Gabriele
text: Durch die Lage gegenüber vom Bahnhof war es ziemlich laut, aber andererseits war die zentrale Lage auch wieder super. Frühstück okay.

name: Reiner
text: alles

name: Mikael
text: Prisvärt

name: Maja
text: Älskade läget det var nära till allt! Personalen var trevlig och väll medvetna om renligheten pga Corona! Frukosten var underbar samt bra tider! Prisvärt hotell och sköna sängar som plus i kanten!

name: Christina
text: Perfekt beliggenhed, behagelig udsmykning og møblering, bøjler på værelset og parkeringskælder, samt stort og lækkert badeværelse.

name: Lene
text: God beliggenhed.

name: Caroline
text: Très bien situé . PT déjeuner copieux

name: Andrea
text: Freundlich, locker, tolle Lage

name: Helena
text: Pyttesmå rum men ändamålsenliga för resande som bara planerar att tillbringa natten på rummet. Jättebra läge mitt emot Centralstationen och intlll gamla staden. Hade föredragit bryggt kaffe i stället för automatbryggt men det är en bagatell.

name: Patrick
text: Rummet - lagom stort och prisvärt

name: Miki
text: Perfekt läge, mycket centralt.

name: Marie
text: Dass es auf Nachfrage hin ein komplettes veganes Frühstück gab Die zentrale Lage Die Sauberkeit

name: Lena
text: Kanske man skulle blivit informerad om att man bodde vid en byggarbetsplats . Det var varmt så man sov med öppet fönster , de började varje dag kl 07 , banka spika och skrek och pratade högt hela tiden , tidigt på morgonen . Alla dagar , söndagen började de lite senare.

name: Jelle
text: Ontbijt simpel maar ok. Goeie koffie. Parkeergarage onder hotel. Ee

name: Alba
text: Rena rum o trevlig personal.

name: Volker

name: Marija
text: Frukosten, personalen, läget... Allt var väldigt bra. Återkommer.

name: Charlottq
text: Bra service, optimalt läge och fräscht hotellrum. Skön säng. Trevlig och tillmötesgående personal. Min dotter och jag hade en toppenvistelse!

name: Eva
text: Pyttelitet rum men med allt man behöver. Rent och snyggt. Galet prisvärt! Frukost helt ok men ingen varm mat.

name: Emma
text: Rummet var rent och snyggt, hade de vi behövde för våran vistelse.

name: Annie
text: Det var centralt och bra läge. Sängen var bekväm. Bra planerade rum.

name: Urban
text: Frukosten var mkt bra. Rummet litet k förhållande till pris. Men å andra sidan låg det centralt i Malmö.

text: - Rummet litet, stilren design. -Gillar deras koncept Lean Living! - Gott om galgar, handdukar & miljömärkt tvål. - Gott om uttag & även uttag för USB/HDMI mm - Fin reception mysig & varm - Toppenläge men be om rum med utsikt mot kanal
